mutants.code:
def convert_to_hours_minutes(seconds):
    minutes = seconds / 60
    hours = minutes // 60
    minutes %= 60
    return f'{hours} hours and {minutes} minutes'

def convert_to_hours_minutes(seconds):
    minutes = seconds * 60
    hours = minutes // 60
    minutes %= 60
    return f'{hours} hours and {minutes} minutes'
